sentences.sentence: The plot of the film is ingeniously conceived.
The man said that,Removes slightly lies ingeniously avoids the dispute position
sentences.translation: 男人说：撤一点小谎巧妙避开争执位

sentences.sentence: He had ingeniously strapped a number of packages to his legs containing contraband items.
sentences.translation: 他很聪明，脚上缠着几盒含有违禁物品的东西。
